Sorry Ron, I was also enroute on Monday.  We always take in bare blades, no habaki, please remove oil.  Kodogu in a box is good, but it's also perfectly OK if you don't have a box.

Jim



  Hi All - 

  Does anyone know how blades and kodogu are to be prepared for shinsa? Do we need "paper saya" for the bare blades? What is needed for tsuba, menuki, etc.?

  See nothing written on this anywhere. Just trying to be prepared to avoid any surprises. Gordon must be enroute, but maybe Jim Gilbert is still on-line?

  Ron
  STL
